Package de.javasoft.swing.filter

Interface Summary
IColumnFilterFactory<M> Factory to create an ColumnFilter.
IRowFilterFactory<M> IRowFilterFactory is a factory of simple, immutable RowFilters comprised of a single match value and one or more columns.
IRowFilterModel<M> A model capturing state which is converted into a RowFilter.
 

Class Summary
AbstractComparableColumnFilter<M> ColumnFilter for Comparable types.
AbstractRowFilterModel<M> AbstractRowFilterModel is an abstract base implemenation of IRowFilterModel which handles listeners and their notification.
BooleanColumnFilter<M> A ColumnFilter implementation for filtering boolean values.
Boundaries Boundaries is an immutable struct comprised of two Objects.
CollectionColumnFilter<M> A ColumnFilter for filtering against a single value in a list.
ColumnFilter<M> Adapter between a column to filter and a filter component.
ColumnFilterFactories ColumnFilterFactories for ColumnFilter types supported in this package.
ColumnFilterFactories.BooleanColumnFilterFactory<M> A factory which creates and configures a BooleanColumnFilter.
ColumnFilterFactories.CollectionColumnFilterFactory<M>  
ColumnFilterFactories.ComparableColumnFilterFactory<M>  
ColumnFilterFactories.DateColumnFilterFactory<M>  
ColumnFilterFactories.PatternColumnFilterFactory<M>  
ColumnFilterFactories.SimpleColumnFilterFactory<M>  
ComparableColumnFilter<M> ColumnFilter for Comparable types.
ComparableRowFilterModel<M> ComparableRowFilterModel is a concrete implementation of RowFilterModel for creating RowFilters for values of type Comparable.
DateColumnFilter<M> ColumnFilter to filter Date types.
FilterContainer Convenience Container with properties and behaviour as useful for filtering components.
PatternColumnFilter<M> Implementation of a pattern-matching ColumnFilter against the String representation of the cell content.
PatternRowFilterModel<M> A pattern matching implementation of RowFilterModel.
SimpleColumnFilter<M> ColumnFilter which controls a JYSearchField to input a single match value and map it a SimpleRowFilterModel with default RowFilterFactory.
SimpleRowFilterModel<M> A RowFilterModel which can handle a single value and has no match rules.
SimpleRowFilterModel.EqualsRowFilterFactory<M> A RowFilterFactory which matches against equals.
 

Enum Summary
ColumnFilter.LifeCycle LifeCycle state supported by this ColumnFilter
